action.msg: Finally caught up with you!
Man, I need to do more cardio...
Hey uh, Fever?
I know you usually like to do that thing where you hold off on transforming till the end...
But maybe we could like- skip out on that this time? Things seem serious.
Yeah... about that...
I’ve been trying to go demon for the last few minutes, and it’s not workin’.
What do you MEAN you can’t? That's just something that can happen? Or... CAN'T?
That’d be cause of me, actually.
Huh? Cause of you?
You’re probably wondering why your so called 'demon form' isn't working.
Considering that you'll both be ash by the end of the day, I guess I can tell you.
I was made with one sole purpose.
Destroying you.
Pfft, whatever. I’ve already dealt with loads of people like you.
I’m already aware. I know that your toughest battle was with the ghost in the painting.
I know about your encounter with the alien nun.
I even know that you’re self-conscious about how loud you snore.
“N-no... this can’t be...
how does he know?
HOW DO YOU KNOW??
EVERYONE on the block knows, Fever.
I’d be surprised if there was a person in Fever Town that COULDN’T hear you snore.
That’s not all either.
Every single robot that came with me into Town has a similar purpose:
To find whoever they were built after.
And end them.
Cleanly, quietly, and mandatory.
But... how? How do you know so much about us?
Your guys’s microphones are one of the WORST when it comes to security.
You guys HACKED into our mics?
For a while now. And we listened.
And copied.
And learned.
And now, we’ll rid all of you, and take the town for ourselves.
Not if WE have anything to say about it! Right babe?
Shit, again??
Seems her robotic counterpart swooped her away.
But enough talk- allow me to reunite you with her.
I’ll use some newfound data this time.
